Package ver14.Model

Class Bitboard

java.lang.Object
ver14.Model.Bitboard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Bitboard extends Object implements Serializable
Bitboard - a bitboard representation of the chess board. every bit set is a chess piece on that square.
Author:
Bezalel Avrahami (bezalel3250@gmail.com)
See Also:
Bitboards, Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • set

      public void set​(Location loc, boolean state)
      Sets the bit on the loc according to state. if state is true, the bit is set to 1 if state is false the bit is set to 0
      Parameters:
      loc - the loc
      state - the state.

    • shiftMe

      public Bitboard shiftMe​(PlayerColor playerColor, Direction direction)
      performs a bitwise shift on this bitboard instance.
      Parameters:
      playerColor - the player color. used for perspective
      direction - the direction to shift in
      Returns:
      the changed bitboard. used to chain actions
